sentences: Rasa became famous in 2004, when she successfully appeared in the national selection to the Eurovision Song Contest 2004 with her song

She performed in LTV show called "Lietuvos Dainų Dešimtukas" ("Lithuanian TOP 10") (in 2006 she won the 2nd place in the final performing a song "Mano Meile" ("My Love") together with Robertas Kupstas).
Now Rasa is performing with duet "Ladies" and together with her band.
